en.title: Portfolio
en.index-header2: i'm a software developer with 2+ years of backend and full-stack experience. I love building scalable applications that solve real-world problems. I primarily work with node.js and Python for backend development On the frontend, I work with Vue.js.
en.index-FAQ-1: Things I get asked a lot
en.index-tabs-answer1: I provide services in the fields of web development, web scraping, and the design and development of various bots.
en.index-tabs-q2: How much does a project cost?
en.index-tabs-answer2: The cost of a project depends on many factors, such as the size of the project, the features, the development time, etc.
en.index-tabs-q3: How does payment work for a project?
en.index-tabs-answer3: I ask for a 10% deposit before starting a project, and the remaining 90% after successful delivery. I accept payments by bank transfer, PayPal, etc...
en.index-tabs-q4: How long does a project take?
en.index-tabs-answer4: It's difficult to give an exact estimate, as each project is different, but the majority of my past work has taken between 3 weeks and 2 months.
en.index-tabs-answer5: I offer a 15% discount for students and non-profit organizations.
en.index-tabs-q6: What do you enjoy most about this work?
en.index-tabs-answer6: I love learning new things and being able to create just about anything from scratch, creating beautiful things that people will use and appreciate.
en.projects-header: a list of projects i worked on
en.about-me: Developer and art director based in Nice, France With over 6 years of experience in the field, I enjoy blending beauty, design and technology to create unique,  bespoke web experiences that exceed my clients' expectations. Whether collaborating with teams or leading design projects, my attention to detail and dedication to excellence have earned me a reputation for delivering exceptional results. Even when I'm not working for my clients, I'm always looking for new things to learn and experiment with. I continue to develop my design and development skills by working on personal projects, reading books, etc...
en.about-me2: I'm a web developer who loves building modern apps with Vue.js, Node.js, and Nuxt.js. I work on both the frontend and backend, and I enjoy combining the two. I also have experience working with Python and Django, and have been working in this field professionally for about two years.
en.about-technologies-use: Some of the software and technologies I use on a daily basis
en.contactMe-lets-talk: Let's talk about your ideas, projects or anything else
